title: About Browncoat
description: Browncoat is the least popular html, sass (scss syntax), and js framework for developing responsive, mobile-last projects on the interwebs. Browncoat provides a folder structure for scss and javascript. It provides a configurable gulp setup for many common tasks. Finally it allows you to modify it and create your own personal/team framework.
